summary: A look at the relationship between pioneering 19th century French neurologist Dr. Jean-Martin Charcot and his star teenage patient, a kitchen maid who is left partially paralyzed after a seizure.
cast: Vincent Lindon|Soko|Chiara Mastroianni|Olivier Rabourdin|Roxane Duran|Lise Lamétrie|Ange Ruzé|Stéphan Wojtowicz|Grégory Gadebois|Valentine Herrenschmidt|Aliénor de Mézamat|Audrey Bonnet|Jeanne Cohendy|Jean-Claude Baudracco|Julie Ravix|Victoire Gonin-Labat|Jacob Vouters|Damien Bonnard|Michel Peteau|Cécile Morel|Jean-Pierre Amiel|Laure-Lucile Simon|Grégoire Monsaingeon|Remy Ourdan|Serge Michel|Patrick Palsky|Deniz Gamze Ergüven|Isabelle Oed|Maroussia Henriet|Océane Chaminade|Fabienne Simon|Marie Garcia|Mélodie Chabert|Laure Josnin|Déborah Révy|Aurore Broutin|Hélène Courvoisier|Mélanie Gérard|Clarisse Dumortier|Blandine Laignel|Anne-Marie Thibierge|Tatiana Mercier|Marie Moineville|Estera Wojtasiak|Michelle Tochet|Ely Prudence Kinczyski|Mari-Mai Corbel|Nathalie Grignard|Juliette Togashi|Néna|Laetitia Malecki|Anna Agostini|Hélène Lebarbier|Patricia Conte|Valentine Fago|Elodie Derlyn|Garance Brin|Karen Mahé|Marie Fabre|Camille Picot|Amélie Sauvage|Eva Doucet|Lucette Rep|Jean-Stéphane Bron|Grégoire Colin|Sophie Cattani|Patrick Winocour|Frans Boyer|Jérémie Carboni|Willy Gauzin
title: Augustine
